title: Serif to identify.
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140331084903im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Serif_4701.jpg)

Hi Type savvy folks.

Here's a classic serif font that for the life of me, can't identify. I thought it was the Times family but it doesn't match especially the Ampersand. Please help!

A.
author: angelstern

comments.content: Your sample is very small... but it could be **[Playfair Display (SemiBold)](http://web.archive.org/web/20140331084903/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Google-Web-Fonts&ffam=Playfair%20Display%20-%20SemiBold&fid=ff627d38f5b7c1d53efc7692729b602a&fsize=48&text=responsibly.%20Thus%20far%20I%20have%20had%20the%20War%2C%20Quirky%20Inc%20%26%20Base%20Design&wrap=2)** by Claus Eggers Sørensen [now available with Google-Web-Fonts]
